content.rendered:
3-Day Detox Diet Plan

3-Day
Detox Diet Plan

[Just 5 Ingredients!]

Learn more!

If you’re looking for a quick way to improve your skin, boost your energy, and lose some weight, our 
3-day detox diet plan is exactly what you need!

Plus, it’s simple, easy, and includes just 5 clean ingredients.

Learn more

BLUEBERRIES
antioxidants

YOGURT
probiotic and protein

SPINACH
Vitamin A and fiber

RED ONIONS
antioxidants

ALMONDS
fat and protein

Learn more

– 1 cup fresh spinach
– 1/2 cup plain nonfat Greek yogurt
– 1 cup blueberries
– 1 1/2 cup water

BREAKFAST

Blueberry Spinach Protein Smoothie

Learn more

– 1 cup plain nonfat Greek yogurt
– 1 cup blueberries
– 1/4 cup almonds

LUNCH

Yogurt and Fruit Bowl

Learn more

– 3 cups of fresh spinach
– 1 cup blueberries
– 1/4 cup almonds
– Sliced red onions
– 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, or apple cider vinegar

DINNER

Sweet and Crunchy Spinach Salad

Learn more

– 12-16oz of water
– 1/2 lemon
– 1/2 lime
– 8 mint leaves
– 1/2 orange

DETOX DRINK

Lemon Water Burst

Learn more

– lemon water
– other unsweetened tea besides green tea
– herbal tea
– apple cider vinegar water

OTHER
APPROVED DRINKS

Learn more

Click the link below for more information and  detailed instructions for this detox plan

excerpt.rendered: Looking for a simple 3-day detox diet plan to help you improve your skin, give you some clean energy, and lose some weight? You’ve come to the right place. Detox Plan includes only 5 foods!

elements.content: If you're looking for a quick way to improve your skin, boost your energy, and lose some weight, our  3-day detox diet plan is exactly what you need!
Plus, it's simple, easy, and includes just 5 clean ingredients.
YOGURT probiotic and protein
SPINACH Vitamin A and fiber
ALMONDS fat and protein
- 1 cup fresh spinach - 1/2 cup plain nonfat Greek yogurt - 1 cup blueberries - 1 1/2 cup water
- 1 cup plain nonfat Greek yogurt - 1 cup blueberries - 1/4 cup almonds
- 3 cups of fresh spinach - 1 cup blueberries - 1/4 cup almonds - Sliced red onions - 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, or apple cider vinegar
- 12-16oz of water - 1/2 lemon - 1/2 lime - 8 mint leaves - 1/2 orange
